channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I suck at port forwrding my server so i need help ok these are the things i did
1st. go no ip made a host and every thing 2nd go uturrent put in 4359 ect 3rd wtf do i do now were do i put my no-ip thing in the game i know i do it to the gui and i change the 0.0.0.0 to my no-ip ip but what do i do then? because when i try to play i cant log in it says error to contenting server when i put that ip as my no-ips adress. please help a noob out =)

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

Is utorrent a portforward thing because if not then you didnt mention doing any portforwarding.
Just use the search button or google and type in auto portforwarder. You will still need to know the pass and what type of a router you are using.

Read full topic
